projects.title: Laerdal Medical

projects.title: University of Agder

projects.title: Varner Tekstil
projects.description: Changed backoffice-solution in all Cubus stores from using a proprietary protocol against a SCO-Unix server for updates/sales reports etc, to using ftp over standard TCP/IP against a Linux server. Also worked as a summer temp in the IT dep. from 1995 to 2000.
